# Project context
uv is used as a package manager. Hence use uv specific commands e.g uv run python -m fcg.main
If you start a server in one terminal, test it in another OR start the terminal in the background

powershell terminal is used. Hence bash commands may differ.

This is a chrome extension.


Create test cases to verify functionalities
when creating test cases, explain for each test case, what exactly is being tested. I might suggest some additional cases as well.
